price: 53. Une fois morts, réduits en poussière et ossements, aurons-nous à répondre de (nos actes) ?" »
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban waʿiẓāman a-innā lamadīnūna
